## Setup
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggalluvial)
```

## Data

Imported from validation

```{r}
dat <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AJThurston/dominance/refs/heads/master/data/da_results.csv", header = T)
```

## Plot

```{r}
dat2 <- dat %>%
  filter(!is.na(val))

# Alluvial: Block 1 â†’ Block 2
ggplot(dat2,
       aes(x = block, y = val, stratum = var_fullname, alluvium = var_fullname)) +
  scale_x_discrete(limits = c("1","2"), expand = c(.1, .05)) +
  geom_alluvium(aes(fill = var_fullname)) +
  geom_stratum(width = 1/8, fill = "grey90", color = "black") +
  theme_minimal() 
```
